Description: Name of the organization where the individual is employed
Designation of the employee (e.g., Software Engineer, Product Manager)
Sector of employment (e.g., Technology, Finance, Healthcare)
City and/or country of the job or the headquarters
Job seniority: Entry, Mid, Senior, or Lead
Indicates whether the job is Remote, Hybrid, or Onsite
Currency in which the salary is paid (e.g., USD, EUR, INR)
Total years of professional experience the employee has
